ygData.subject: Re: A Spark of Hope
ygData.msgSnippet: With the spark chamber safely stored, he now had to contend with a new communication.  From the message and the sender ID, it was Kup.  WHat did he want?

With the spark chamber safely stored, he now had to contend with a new comm=
unication.=A0 From the message and the sender ID, it was Kup.=A0 WHat did h=
e want?=A0 He had better things to do than listen to some doddering old Aut=
obot spin endless yarns of his past.=A0 But at the very least he could pass=
 the word to leave him alone and not to try and find him.
=A0
"What do you =
want, Autobot?=A0 It must be important if you come looking for me despite m=
y absence."

ng 
time ago.

"Megatron... do you copy?"said Kup by Comlink "It's Kup!!!" =


"Grimlock is confused" said the t-rex robot.

<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;"><DIV>With the spark chamber safely stored, he now had to contend with a new communication.  From the message and the sender ID, it was Kup.  WHat did he want?  He had better things to do than listen to some doddering old Autobot spin endless yarns of his past.  But at the very least he could pass the word to leave him alone and not to try and find him.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
